PerfectNetExp.abs: Petiole to 2.5 cm ; leaf blade glabrous , adaxially bluish green , abaxially purplish ., 叶柄长达 2.5 厘米 ; 叶片无毛 , 正面带蓝色绿色 , 背面略带紫色.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... velvety adj 柔软光滑的，爽口的 | glabrous adj 光洁的，无毛的 ointment n． 油膏，软膏 |.
【食品词典】G3 ... girasole 菊芋 glabrous 光滑的；无毛的 glace fruit 糖渍果；液态蜜饯.
1. 光滑(glabrous):表示表面无任何被覆物,此并非为一个适当的被覆专有名词,而为这些专有名词的反义字(antonym).2. 近光滑(glabrate).

list.abs: herbs perennial , acaulescent , 3-8 cm tall , usually glabrous .多年生草本，无茎，3-8厘米高，通常无毛。
ovary glabrous ; leaves oblanceolate , adaxial surface usually wax-coated .子房无毛倒披针形的叶，蜡种皮的通常正面。
rachis and pedicels glabrous or puberulous , gradually glabrescent , with small ellipsoid lenticels ;, 轴和花梗无毛或被微柔毛 , 逐渐后脱落 , 带有小的椭圆体皮孔;
leaf base rounded to subcordate , adaxially glabrous ., 叶基部圆形到近心形 , 正面无毛.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin glaber, glabr- 'hairless, smooth' + -ous

means.word_mean: 1. having no hair or similar growth; smooth;
